title: "Google Analytics"
description: "Query Google Analytics data"
icon: google
---

<Warning>This is currently under development.</Warning>

### Demonstration

<video
  controls
  className="w-full aspect-video"
  src="/videos/google_analytics.mp4"
></video>

### Tool Schema

```yaml
type: google_analytics
google_analytics:
  name: google_analytics
  description: Query my website's Google Analytics data
  parameters:
    type: object
    properties:
      propertyId:
        type: string
        description: Google Analytics property ID.
      credentialsFile:
        type: string
        description: Path to the Google Analytics credentials file.
      dimensions:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
        description: List of dimensions to include in the report (i.e. city).
      metrics:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
        description: List of metrics to include in the report (i.e. activeUsers).
      dateRanges:
        type: array
        items:
          type: string
        description: List of date ranges to include in the report (i.e. 2023-03-31,
          today).
    required:
    - propertyId
    - credentialsFile
    - dimensions
    - metrics
    - dateRanges
```
